channel.title: Natural Language Processing on Decoding AI's Evolution
channel.description: Recent content in Natural Language Processing on Decoding AI's Evolution

item.title: Teaching AI to Read and Group Like I Bookmark the Web: A Journey into Dynamic Topic Modeling
item.description:
Quick Links: Dataset on HuggingFace

The Topic Modeling Challenge

You know that feeling when you have 50 browser tabs open, and you’re desperately trying to organize them into bookmark folders? “ML Papers To Read,” “Funny Cat Videos,” “Recipes I’ll Never Make”… We all have our system. And apparently, it’s such a universal problem that every tech company is launching their own solution - Arc Browser with its “Spaces,” Chrome with its tab groups, and about 500 extensions promising to color-code your digital hoarding habits into submission.

item.title: YC-Dendrolinguistics: Planting Linguistic Trees in the Startup Forest
item.description:
Hey there, fellow AI adventurers and startup enthusiasts! ðŸŒ³ðŸš€ Today, I’m excited to give you a peek into my latest passion project: YC-Dendrolinguistics. Buckle up as we embark on a journey through the linguistic forests of Y-Combinator pitches!

The Seed of an Idea

Picture this: It’s 2 AM, I’m knee-deep in YC application videos, and suddenly it hits me â€“ what if startup pitches are like trees? ðŸ¤” Each word a branch, each phrase a limb, growing into this complex organism we call a pitch. That’s when YC-Dendrolinguistics was born, my wild attempt to map the DNA of startup communication.
